name: Metal Gear Ryckert
description:
Stop Hideo Kojima's master plan and destroy Metal Gear Ryckert! He's going to get more powerful each time you destroy him, but you can stop him with your shooting suit!

Note: Apparently the text in game looks weird in FIrefox. I'd recommend using Chrome to play the game.

Created for the Giant ROM 2 game jam. Theme: Giant Bomb/What Hideo Kojima Does Next

It's a relatively simple top down shooter, but it can get very difficult near the end. Not really too much more to say, so you should just play it!

Move with arrow keys/WASD, aim and shoot with the mouse.
